'''Discipline of the Supreme Arbitration''' is [[Neuvillette]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

== Gameplay Notes ==

* Neuvillette's current HP need to be at least '''80%''' of his Max HP to get the maximum '''30%''' {{Color|Hydro DMG Bonus}}.
